28 #include "StateModel.h"
29 #include "Thermodynamics.h"

32 namespace Mutation {
33  namespace Thermodynamics {
34 
40 class EquilStateModel : public StateModel
41 {
42 public:
46  EquilStateModel(const Thermodynamics& thermo)
47  : StateModel(thermo, 1, 1)
48  {
49  const int ns = m_thermo.nSpecies();
50 
51  // Allocate work storage
52  mp_h = new double [ns*3];
53  mp_work = new double [ns];
54  mp_cp = mp_h + ns;
55  mp_dxdt = mp_cp + ns;
56 
57  // Initial solution
58  double T = 300.0;
59  double P = ONEATM;
60  setState(&P, &T, 1);
61  }
62 
63  virtual ~EquilStateModel()
64  {
65  delete [] mp_h; // other arrays allocated by this one
66  delete [] mp_work;
67  }
68 
77  virtual void setState(
78  const double* const p_mass, const double* const p_energy,
79  const int vars = 0)
80  {
81  // Determine temperature, pressure, and mole fractions depending on
82  // variable set
83  switch (vars) {
84  // Given density and energy density (conserved variables)
85  case 0: {
86  assert(p_mass[0] > 0.0);
87  assert(p_energy[0] > 0.0);
88 
89  const int ns = m_thermo.nSpecies();
90  const int max_iters = 50;
91  const double tol = 1.0e-12;
92  const double tolAbs = 1.0e-10;
93  const double rho = p_mass[0];
94  const double rhoe = p_energy[0];
95 
96  double mw, h, cpeq, dfdt, dmwdt, f1, f2, dT;
97 
98  // Use the previous solution as the initial guess
99  //m_thermo.equilibriumComposition(m_T, m_P, mp_X);
100  m_thermo.speciesHOverRT(m_T, mp_h);
101  mw = m_thermo.mixtureMw();
102 
103  h = 0.0;
104  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
105  h += mp_h[i]*mp_X[i];
106  h *= RU*m_T;
107  f1 = rhoe - rho*h/mw + m_P;
108  f2 = rho - m_P*mw/(RU*m_T);
109 
110  int iter = 0;
111  while ((std::max(std::abs(f1/(std::abs(rhoe)+tolAbs)),std::abs(f2/(rho+tolAbs))) > tol)
112  && (std::max(std::abs(f1),std::abs(f2)) > tolAbs)) {
113  // Print warning if this is taking too long
114  if (++iter % max_iters == 0) {
115  std::cout << "setState() taking too many iterations for Equil StateModel!"
116  << " It is likely that the input arguments are not feasible..." << std::endl;
117  std::cout << "density [kg/m^3] = " << rho << ", energy [J/m^3] = " << rhoe << std::endl;
118  }
119 
120  // Compute df1/dT which is the main term
121  m_thermo.speciesCpOverR(m_T, mp_cp);
122 
123  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
124  mp_dxdt[i] = -mp_h[i] / m_T;
125  m_thermo.equilSolver()->dXdg(mp_dxdt, mp_dxdt);
126 
127  cpeq = 0;
128  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
129  cpeq += mp_h[i]*mp_dxdt[i];
130  cpeq *= m_T;
131  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
132  cpeq += mp_cp[i]*mp_X[i];
133  cpeq *= RU;
134 
135  dmwdt = 0.0;
136  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
137  dmwdt += m_thermo.speciesMw(i)*mp_dxdt[i];
138 
139  dfdt = rho*(cpeq*mw - h*dmwdt)/(mw*mw);
140 
141  // Update T
142  dT = -f1/dfdt;
143  while (dT > m_T) dT *= 0.5; // prevent negative T
144  m_T -= dT;
145 
146  // Update P (lagging Mwmix)
147  m_P = rho*RU*m_T/mw;
148 
149  // Update the composition
150  m_thermo.equilibriumComposition(m_T, m_P, mp_X);
151 
152  // Recompute f (and mw, h)
153  m_thermo.speciesHOverRT(m_T, mp_h);
154  mw = m_thermo.mixtureMw();
155 
156  h = 0.0;
157  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
158  h += mp_h[i]*mp_X[i];
159  h *= RU*m_T;
160  f1 = rhoe - rho*h/mw + m_P;
161  f2 = rho - m_P*mw/(RU*m_T);
162  }
163 
164  }
165  break;
166 
167  // Given pressure and temperature (using default elemental fractions)
168  case 1:
169  assert(p_mass[0] > 0.0);
170  assert(p_energy[0] > 0.0);
171 
172  m_T = p_energy[0];
173  m_P = p_mass[0];
174  m_thermo.equilibriumComposition(m_T, m_P, mp_X);
175  break;
176 
177  // Given elemental mole fractions and temperature and pressure
178  case 2:
179  assert(p_energy[0] > 0.0);
180  assert(p_energy[1] > 0.0);
181 
182  m_T = p_energy[1];
183  m_P = p_energy[0];
184  m_thermo.equilibriumComposition(m_T, m_P, p_mass, mp_X);
185  break;
186 
187  // Unknown variable set
188  default:
189  throw InvalidInputError("variable set", vars)
190  << "This variable-set is not implemented in EquilStateModel"
191  << ". Possible variable-sets are:\n"
192  << " 0: (mixture density, static energy density)\n"
193  << " 1: (pressure, temperature)\n"
194  << " 2: (element mole fractions, pressure and temperature)";
195  }
196 
197  // Set the remaining temperatures
198  m_Tr = m_Tv = m_Tel = m_Te = m_T;
199  }
200 
201  void getTemperatures(double* const p_T) const
202  {
203  p_T[0] = m_T;
204  }
205 
206  void getEnergiesMass(double* const p_e)
207  {
208  const int ns = m_thermo.nSpecies();
209  m_thermo.speciesHOverRT(mp_work);
210 
211  for(int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
212  p_e[i] = (mp_work[i] - 1.0)*m_T*RU/m_thermo.speciesMw(i);
213  }
214 
215  void getEnthalpiesMass(double* const p_h)
216  {
217  const int ns = m_thermo.nSpecies();
218  m_thermo.speciesHOverRT(mp_work);
219 
220  for(int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
221  p_h[i] = mp_work[i]*m_T*RU/m_thermo.speciesMw(i);
222  }
223 
224  void getCpsMass(double* const p_Cp)
225  {
226  const int ns = m_thermo.nSpecies();
227  m_thermo.speciesCpOverR(m_T, mp_work);
228 
229  for(int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
230  p_Cp[i] = mp_work[i]*RU/m_thermo.speciesMw(i);
231  }
232 
233  void getCvsMass(double* const p_Cv)
234  {
235  const int ns = m_thermo.nSpecies();
236  m_thermo.speciesCpOverR(m_T, mp_work);
237 
238  for(int i = 0; i < ns; ++i)
239  p_Cv[i] = (mp_work[i]-1.0)*RU/m_thermo.speciesMw(i);
240  }
241 
242 
243 private:
244 
245  double* mp_h;
246  double* mp_work;
247  double* mp_cp;
248  double* mp_dxdt;
249 };
250 
251 // Register the state model
252 Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<
253  EquilStateModel, StateModel> equil_sm("Equil");
254 
264 class EquilTPStateModel : public EquilStateModel
265 {
266 public:
267  EquilTPStateModel(const Thermodynamics& thermo)
268  : EquilStateModel(thermo)
269  { }
270 
274  virtual void setState(
275  const double* const p_T, const double* const p_P, const int vars = 1)
276  {
277  //assert(vars == 1);
278  EquilStateModel::setState(p_P, p_T, 1);
279  }
280 };
281 
282 // Register the state model
283 Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<
284  EquilTPStateModel, StateModel> equiltp_sm("EquilTP");
285
